tmFileblockings.fbReplacementText: Cloud App Security detected and removed a file named "[Attachment Name]" that violated file blocking policy from the original email entity. You can safely save or delete this replacement attachment.

notification.ntfAdminMessage:
%Product_Name% detected a file that meets File Blocking policies.

Action taken: %action%
Message details:
	Last modify time: %date% %time%
	Found in: %foundin%
	Violator: %violator%
	File name: %filename%
notification.ntfAdminSubject: Trend Micro Cloud App Security for Office 365 Advanced Threat Protection
notification.ntfInternalRecipientMessage:
%Product_Name% detected a file that meets File Blocking policies.Make sure that you have recently modified this file as intended. Otherwise, delete the file in the cloud.

Action taken: %action%
Message details:
	Last modify time: %date% %time%
	Found in: %foundin%
	Violator: %violator%
	File name: %filename%
notification.ntfInternalRecipientSubject: Trend Micro Cloud App Security for Office 365 Advanced Threat Protection

tmVirusscans.vsReplacementText: Cloud App Security detected and removed a security risk from the original email message [Attachment Name].
tmVirusscans.vsReplacementTextUnscannable: Cloud App Security deleted the attached file which is encrypted and password protected or outside of scan restriction criteria from the original email attachment "[Attachment Name]". You can safely save or delete this replacement attachment.

notification.ntfAdminMessage:

Risk level: %risk_level%

	Found in: %foundin%
	File name: %filename%
	Violator: %violator%
	Category: %url_category%
